entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:10 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 08:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -21.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -24.5°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with a few rain showers in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
